languages.text: "Я бы не советовал прикасаться к сему проклятому артефакту, если ваша душа вам все еще дорога".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы не советовал прикосаться к сему проклятому артефакту, если ваша душа вам все еще дорога".

languages.text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."
languages.original_text: "Я бы не советовал прикасаться к сему проклятому артефакту, если ваша душа вам все еще дорога".

traits.locale_text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."
"I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."
"I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."
"I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."
"I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."

languages.text: 「自分の魂が惜しいなら、この呪われたアーティファクトに触らないほうがいいですよ」
languages.original_text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の魂が惜しいなら、この呪われたアーティファクトに触らないほうがいいですよ」

languages.text: «Le recomendaría no tocar el artefacto poseído si valora en algo su alma».
languages.original_text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."

traits.locale_text: «Le recomendaría no tocar el artefacto poseído si valora en algo su alma».

languages.text: “如果你不希望灵魂被玷污的话，我建议你不要碰这件邪恶的造物。”
languages.original_text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."

traits.locale_text: “如果你不希望灵魂被玷污的话，我建议你不要碰这件邪恶的造物。”

languages.text: « Si vous tenez à votre âme, je vous déconseille de toucher cet artefact possédé. »
languages.original_text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous tenez à votre âme, je vous déconseille de toucher cet artefact possédé. »

languages.text: "Ich würde davon abraten, dieses besessene Artefakt zu berühren, wenn Euch Eure Seele noch lieb ist."
languages.original_text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde davon abraten, dieses besessene Artefakt zu berühren, wenn Euch Eure Seele noch lieb ist."

languages.text: "Ruhunun bir değeri varsa o ele geçirilmiş esere dokunmamanı salık veririm."
languages.original_text: "I would advise against touching this possessed artefact if you still value your soul."
